ingredients.ingredient: ½ cup low-calorie natural sweetener (such as Swerve®)

cookingTips: Mix ingredients until just combined to avoid overmixing which can make cookies dense
Press dough flat with a fork for the classic crosshatch pattern and even baking
Chill dough for 15 minutes before baking for better texture
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide me through making keto peanut butter cookies step-by-step, including mixing, shaping, and baking temperature and time
